content: The Republicans keep insisting that there was massive fraud because in their eyes, only rich white men have the right to vote. Letting women and ethnic minorities is “fraud” to them, which is why they keep suppressing votes against them illegally and whining about how every election that they don’t win was “stolen” from them. The worst part is that if every black and latino vote that was illegally thrown out as “fraudulent” had been counted as it should have been, Trump wouldn’t be in the White House now, he’d be demanding recounts left and right and trying to find new ways to screw up our election system. “It’s not who casts the ballots that matter, it’s who counts them.” — Fidel Castro.
